name: CLARITY_LWS_3
description: The CLARITY_LWS_3 table contains basic information about workstations used in your system.

columns.name: WORK_STATION_2_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the workstation record.

columns.name: KIOSK_DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: This is the display name of the workstation in Welcome-related screens in Hyperspace, such as the kiosk tree view.
